_meta.description: Airtime design system sizing and spacing tokens. Theme-independent.
_meta.naming: CSS custom properties use --size-{N} and --space-{N} patterns. N is the token scale step, not the px value.
_meta.scale: Linear 4px base with 2px sub-steps at the small end. Size tokens use x10 naming (size-10 = 4px, size-20 = 8px). Jumps at larger values in spacing scale.
